children: Ottawa ankle and foot rules. An ankle radiographic series is indicated if a patient has pain in the malleolar zone and any of the following findings: bone tenderness at

, or inability to bear weight immediately and in the emergency department or physician's office. A foot radiographic series is indicated if a patient has pain in the midfoot zone and any of the following findings: bone tenderness at
, or inability to bear weight immediately and in the emergency department or physician's office.
